description: This file defines the KeycloakUserService class which manages user-related operations through Keycloak API, such as creating, updating, and reading user information within the application.

classes.name: KeycloakUserService
classes.description: Service class for managing Keycloak user operations like create, read, and update.

methods.name: createUser
methods.description: Creates a new user in Keycloak using the provided UserRepresentation object.

methods.name: updateUser
methods.description: Updates an existing user in Keycloak identified by the UserRepresentation provided.

methods.name: readUserByEmail
methods.description: Searches and retrieves a list of users matching the email provided.

methods.name: readUser
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information about a user by their auth ID, throws EntityNotFoundException if not found.
